hyperreflexia
moderate bilateral arm and leg weakness
surgery followed by radiation therapy
• enhancing lower cervical intradural extramedullary mass.
• spinal cord compressed by mass.
meningeal hemangiopericytoma cervical spine
• meningioma
• schwannoma
• metastatic lesion
• lymphoma
35 year old hiv positive prisoner complained of bilateral arm weakness and neck pain.
